Une DocuTh\u00e8que ressemble \u00e0 un: A DocuThèque is like a directory of files that can contain as many folders as needed to organize your documents and make them available for download to your site’s visitors.
Vous pouvez cr\u00e9er autant de DocuTh\: You can create as many DocuThèques as you want. Note however that only one DocuThèque can be inserted into one unique site’s page.
Cet espace est d\u00e9di\u00e9 \u00e0 la: This space is dedicated to the management of your DocuThèques. To insert them into the pages of your site, you need to use the DocuThèques block from your WordPress content editor.
Les documents ajout\u00e9s \u00e0 une Do: Documents added to a DocuThèque have a unique, invariable download link until they are permanently deleted.
La barre lat\u00e9rale de gauche de cet: The left sidebar of this administration screen displays the tree structure of your DocuThèques. The active element of the latter (white text on a blue background) informs about the location where will be inserted your new folders and documents.
Par d\u00e9faut, l\u2019\u00e9cran d\u20: By default, the DocuThèques administration screen displays all WordPress media that are not attached to a DocuThèque at the root of the tree that is displayed in the left sidebar.
Pour ajouter une DocuTh\u00e8que, clique: To add a DocuThèque, click on the « + » button, located just after the title of the DocuThèques administration screen. You will be able to use the insertion menu to add documents or create a new DocuThèque.
Pour ajouter un dossier ou un document \: To add a folder or a document into your DocuThèque, first activate your DocuThèque by clicking on its title from the tree. Then click on the « + » button to display the insertion menu to add documents or a folder.
Modifier une DocuTh\u00e8que ou un de se: Edit a DocuThèque or one of its folders
Activez dans un premier temps l\u2019\u0: First, activate the element of your choice by clicking on its title in the tree. Then click on the toolbar nut-shaped button to switch to advanced editing mode. The toolbar will then include two new buttons to modify or delete your item.
En cliquant sur le bouton en forme d\u20: By clicking on the toolbar nut-shaped button, you switch to advanced editing mode so that you can modify, move or delete one or more documents. Action buttons appear in the toolbar when you click the document thumbnail.
Cette action est irr\u00e9versible, merc: This action can’t be undone, please confirm you want to delete a document.
This action can’t be undone, please confirm you want to delete %d documents.
Cette action supprimera tous les \u00e9v: This action will delete all potential folders that may contain the DocuThèque.
This action will delete all potential folders that may contain this folder.
Supprimer tous les documents contenus da: Delete all documents this DocuThèque contains.
Delete all documents this folder contains.
Le document \u00ab %1$s \u00bb n\u2018a: The document « %1$s » was not created due to this error: %2$s
The document « %1$s » was not edited due to this error: %2$s
The document « %1$s » was not deleted due to this error: %2$s
Le dossier \u00ab %1$s \u00bb n\u2018a p: The folder « %1$s » was not created due to this error: %2$s
Le dossier n\u2018a pas pu \u00eatre mod: The folder was not edited due to this error: %2$s
Le dossier n\u2018a pas pu \u00eatre sup: The folder was not deleted due to this error: %2$s
Il n\u2019existe aucun document directem: There are no documents directly attached to root for now.
Cette DocuTh\u00e8que ne contient aucun: There are no documents directly attached to this DocuThèque for now.
Ce dossier ne contient aucun document di: There are no documents directly attached to this folder for now.
Aucun document dont le nom contient \u00: No documents containing « %s » into its name was found there.
Fermer le formulaire d\u2019ajout de dos: Close the form to create a folder
Fermer le formulaire de modification d\u: Close the form to edit a folder
Utiliser la barre lat\u00e9rale de gauch: Use the left sidebar to move the folder into another DocuThèque.
Le dossier sera d\u00e9plac\u00e9 dans \: The folder will be moved to « %s ».
T\u00e9l\u00e9verser un ou plusieurs nou: Upload one or more new document(s) into the active folder
Upload one or more new document(s)
Fermer le formulaire d\u2019ajout de doc: Close the form to add new document(s)
Utiliser le bouton ci-dessous pour s\u00: Use the button below to select your document(s) or drop them into this dash delimited area to upload them into the active folder.
Utiliser la barre lat\u00e9rale de gauch: Use the left sidebar to move the document into another DocuThèque.
Le document \u00ab %1$s \u00bb sera d\u0: The document « %1$s » will be moved to « %2$s ».
Utiliser la barre lat\u00e9rale de gauch: Use the left sidebar to move the documents into another DocuThèque.
Les documents \u00ab %1$s \u00bb seront: The documents « %1$s » will be moved to « %2$s ».
Fermer le formulaire de modification de: Close the form to edit documents
T\u00e9l\u00e9verser la nouvelle version: Upload a new version of the document
